thread.title: Video: 3-D printed milk cap can tell when milk has spoiled
thread.title_full: Video: 3-D printed milk cap can tell when milk has spoiled - MarketWatch

author: By     MarketWatch
title: Video: 3-D printed milk cap can tell when milk has spoiled
text:
3-D Printed Milk Cap Can Tell When Milk Has Spoiled (3:17) A milk cap developed by scientists at the Univ. of Calif., Berkeley, and National Chiao Tung University in Taiwan demonstrates the potential of 3-D printing for creating electronics. Photo: Jake Nicol for The Wall Street Journal.
For more video news: Visit our MarketWatch Video Center .
